name: A-tree-tion
description:
Team Sick n' Tired's contribution to Global Game Jam 2023. The theme was "Roots".

Play as a root, tied to the mother tree in he center. Protect your family by linking yourself to them. As your web of roots grows, giving you speed and distance, a plague of infected mushrooms pushes to take it all away. Rejuvinate the four pillars of decay in order to purify your forest of the growing threat.

Controls:

Left Mouse Button (Hold): Move & Camera

Right Mouse Button: Dash

Dash into trees to rejuvinate them.


Credits:

Timothe Lafond - Programmer, Game & Level Design

Patricia Becerra - 3D & Character Artist

Jessica Zhu - 3D, 2D & UI Art

Jihad Jbaida - 2D & UI Art
